explanation: [0-0] A man stands on a wooden plank of a metal scaffold, spraying a wall with a plaster spraying tool. He is wearing a beige cotton-padded jacket and black pants, orange gloves, and grey rain boots. The background is a red brick wall.
[0-3] The man moves the spraying tool in his hand methodically, ensuring the plaster is evenly spread on the wall.

[3-7] The man continues to operate the spraying tool, bending over and gradually moving downwards to complete the spraying of the lower part of the wall.
